comprehensive_overview: SWIG (Simplified Wrapper and Interface Generator) is a software development tool that connects programs written in C and C++ with scripting languages such as Perl, Python, Ruby, Tcl, and more. It simplifies the process of creating interfaces for these languages, enabling developers to easily incorporate C/C++ code into their scripting language-based projects.
core_features:
1. Automatic generation of interface code for C/C++ libraries
2. Support for multiple scripting languages
3. Simplifies the integration of C/C++ code with scripting languages
4. Customizable and flexible code generation
5. Designed to work with different types of C/C++ code and data structures
